participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves to express herself through singing and playing.
participant_1.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i am in the third grade.

participant_2.name: Ryan Smith
participant_2.personality: Reflective and candid, values simplicity and enjoys sharing experiences.
participant_2.background: i did not graduate high school. i live in canada. my grandfather served in world war a. my favourite food is shawarma.
